sentences.english: Objective To reveal the morphology feature of postcapillary venule .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨人皮肤癌毛细血管后微静脉的形态特征。

sentences.english: They lie still under an ultra-violet lamp, tempting fate with skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他们冒着患皮肤癌的危险，躺在紫外线灯下。

sentences.english: The overuse of the sunbed may cause the skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 过度使用太阳灯灯浴床会引发皮肤癌。

sentences.english: I hear of, if the dot is dropped, leave scar gently, weigh a meeting change to become skin cancer?
sentences.chinese: 我听说，点掉的话，轻则留疤，重则会转变成皮肤癌？

sentences.english: The element can trigger conditions ranging from anaemia to skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 这种有毒元素会引起从贫血症到皮肤癌等各种病症。

sentences.english: Cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma (SCC) is a common cancer.
sentences.chinese: 表皮鳞状细胞癌为一常见之皮肤癌。

sentences.english: Grapes could protect against skin cancer and prevent premature ageing, research has revealed.
sentences.chinese: 研究发现，葡萄可以防止皮肤癌以及防止早衰。

sentences.english: The author studied the changes of basement membrane (BM) of experimental skin cancerin mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究实验性皮肤癌基底膜的变化。

sentences.english: Germany is soon to become the first country to introduce universal skin-cancer screening.
sentences.chinese: 德国不久将成为第一个实行全面的皮肤癌筛检的国家。

sentences.english: When detected early, most forms of skin cancer are quite treatable.
sentences.chinese: 发现及时的话，大部分的皮肤癌是可以治愈的。

sentences.english: Too much sun exposure can result in skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 过度接触阳光会导致皮肤癌。

sentences.english: Cyclosporine may increase your risk of developing certain types of cancer, including skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 环孢霉素可能增加你患某些癌症的风险，包括皮肤癌。

sentences.english: This may help prevent the development of skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 这可能有助于对预防皮肤癌的发展。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of electrochemical therapy on arsenicum-induced skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨使用电化学治疗砷致皮肤癌的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Stress and skin cancer share a connection.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤癌与精神压力有关。

sentences.english: Over-exposure to the sun causes skin cancer killing 20 people every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有20人死于过度享受阳光而罹患的皮肤癌。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
